definition: to speak/to explain/to negotiate/to emphasise/to be particular about/as far as sth is concerned/speech/lecture
surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy
to be loyal (to one's friends)/to value loyalty

sentences.english: If you have handouts, do not read straight from them.
sentences.chinese: 如果你准备了讲义，不要完全照着读。

sentences.english: I've put this on the handout.
sentences.chinese: 我已经把这个放在讲义里了。

sentences.english: People like Li Mei-t' ing , who had been teaching for years, had ready-made lecture notes.
sentences.chinese: 不过李梅亭这些人都是教授有年，有现成讲义的。

sentences.english: You won't find these bugs in your handout, right?
sentences.chinese: 你在你们的讲义上找不到漏洞对吗？

sentences.english: He ran a batch of mimeographed sheets off .
All right. So we can switch back to our notes.
And so I want to quote Dr. Johnson here, and this is on the handout.
sentences.chinese: 在这里我想引用约翰逊博士，这在讲义上有。

sentences.english: The master copy can not exceed 50 pages.
sentences.chinese: 每一科目讲义原稿一次送印请勿超过50页。

sentences.english: His answer was just a rehashed version of my lecture.
sentences.chinese: 不过是把我的讲义重复了一遍。

sentences.english: So on your handouts make sure you take that not out on slide 16.
sentences.chinese: 所以在你们的讲义上把16页的不字去掉。

sentences.english: So you have a handout that breaks down the three major components.
sentences.chinese: 你们手中有张讲义是介绍圣经三大部分的。

sentences.english: Now I want to talk about the handout.
So you have a couple of handouts that should help you here.
sentences.chinese: 你们手中的几张讲义在这里应该能有帮助。

sentences.english: So back to the first thing to do, reality as it is in itself in my handout.
sentences.chinese: 回到第一件事，讲义中的事实。

sentences.english: So most and you got it, so we can switch to the notes and let's talk about this here.
sentences.chinese: 大部分人都做对了，我们切换到讲义来讲一下。

sentences.english: You can now look at your handouts.

definition: courseware (abbr. for 課程軟件|课程软件[ke4 cheng2 ruan3 jian4])
lesson plan/teaching plan/a "missionary case" (a dispute over Christian missionaries during the late Qing)
to take down (in writing)/notes/a type of literature consisting mainly of short sketches/CL:本[ben3]
problem or question solved for illustrative purposes in the classroom/practice question (used in preparation for an exam)/sample question
question bank (for examiners creating an exam, or students preparing for an exam)
to attend a class/to go to a lecture
